subject: Change Coupon Code
description_text:
Hello,

I just set up my affiliate account under official.artemisesports@gmail.com, but the coupon is “MARK”. 

Could we change it to “ARTEMIS” or “ARTEMISESPORTS”?

Thank you,

Mark Katske
Owner/CEO
Artemis Esports LLC

conversations.body_text: Hi Artemis Esports,    Alright, I've changed it for you to: ARTEMIS
